code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{getCourses}from'../mockData';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Courses(){const[courses,setCourses]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{getCourses().then(setCourses);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"mt-10",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"\u0BAA\u0B9F\u0BBF\u0BAA\u0BCD\u0BAA\u0BC1\u0B95\u0BB3\u0BCD"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-6",children:courses.map(c=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.div,{className:"p-6 bg-white rounded-lg shadow",whileHover:{y:-5},transition:{type:'spring',stiffness:200},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-lg font-semibold",children:c.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mt-2 text-sm",children:c.desc})]},c.id))})]});}
